item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, March 29, 2024 at 3:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried sentenced to 25 years in prison for fraud
2. Thames Water shareholders signal readiness to take £5bn hit
3.  For young people, the job search has never been so miserable
4. Angela Rayner refuses to publish tax records as police probe house sale
5. Poland sacks Nato-EU battlegroup chief over counter-intelligence issue
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, March 29, 2024 at 3:45 AM UTC
